National Stadium Karachi Boundary Length

In this cricket ground, the straight boundary stretches to 70 meters, showcasing its modest size. Mid-wicket boundaries measure approximately 68 meters, while the square boundaries are a compact 62 meters, offering exciting challenges for batsmen.

FAQs About Karachi Stadium

Here are some of the most commonly asked questions about the Fortress of Pakistani Cricket.

The stadium was established in 1995, for India’s Tour to Pakistan.

National Stadium has hosted quite a few international matches, as well as a few matches of the 1987 cricket world cup and few matches of the 1996 world cup.

The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) looks after the National Stadium, Karachi.

Yes, there are parking facilities available in the stadium.
